about.description:
The LSC Algorithm Pulsar Library for gravitational wave data analysis.
This package contains the python bindings.

name: python-lalpulsar

        - six
test:
    commands:
        - pushd test/python; LAL_TEST_PKGDATADIR="${LALPULSAR_DATADIR}" python -m
            pytest -v; popd
    imports:
        - lalpulsar
        - lalpulsar.NstarTools
        - lalpulsar.PulsarParametersWrapper
        - lalpulsar.simulateCW
    requires:
        - pytest >=4.0.0a0
    source_files:
        - test/python
about:
    description: 'The LSC Algorithm Pulsar Library for gravitational wave data analysis.

        This package contains the python bindings.'
    dev_url: https://git.ligo.org/lscsoft/lalsuite/
    doc_url: https://lscsoft.docs.ligo.org/lalsuite/lalpulsar/
    home: https://wiki.ligo.org/Computing/LALSuite
    license: GPL-2.0-or-later
    license_family: GPL
    license_file: COPYING
    summary: LSC Algorithm Pulsar Library
extra:
    copy_test_source_files: true
    final: true
    recipe-maintainers:
        - duncanmmacleod
        - skymoo
